caption: MCP Server Configuration
description: Data for the MCP server configuration used by an agent. Exact attribute names may vary depending on the client or platform.
name: mcp_server_configuration

env_file.caption: Environment Variables File
env_file.description: Path to a file containing environment variables.

url.caption: Server URL
url.description: URL for the MCP server (used for remote servers).

headers.caption: Headers
headers.description: HTTP headers for the MCP server (used for remote servers).

tool_configuration.caption: Tool Configuration
tool_configuration.description: Configuration for tools that the MCP server can use.

scope.caption: Scope
scope.description: Scope of the MCP server configuration (e.g., 'global', 'workspace').
